name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Performance】Risu's Isekai Express ： Special Performance Delivery【#RiSekaiExpress】 [995QkX6r7RA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Risu talks about her new original song 'Metropolis' and its release details while driving her truck.
Risu's truck arrives at the 'FUN ZONE' amusement park-themed stage.
Risu performs the song 'Kero! to March' on stage.

subtitles.original: Cocok banget sama vibe perkotaan gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: It fits the city vibe perfectly, guys.

subtitles.original: Terus, kalian nyadar nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Also, did you guys notice?

subtitles.original: Judulnya kalau dibaca pakai logat Jepang, guys,
subtitles.english: If you read the title with a Japanese accent, guys,

subtitles.original: cara bacanya tuh jadi "Metroporisu".
subtitles.english: the way to say it is "Metroporisu".

subtitles.original: Metroporisu.
subtitles.english: Metroporisu.

subtitles.original: Jadi di judulnya ada nama Risu-nya gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: So, there's Risu's name in the title, guys.

subtitles.original: Keren, kan? Weh, keren lah.
subtitles.english: Cool, right? Of course it is.

subtitles.original: Terus lagunya sengaja dibuat upbeat
subtitles.english: Also, the song was intentionally made upbeat

subtitles.original: biar bisa bikin kalian semangat gitu, guys,
subtitles.english: to get you guys hyped up,

subtitles.original: pas berangkat atau pulang sekolah, kerja,
subtitles.english: when going to or coming home from school, work,

subtitles.original: dll gitu lah.
subtitles.english: and things like that.

subtitles.original: Abis itu lagunya juga cocok banget buat
subtitles.english: Besides that, the song is also very suitable

subtitles.original: nemenin kalian jalan-jalan di malam hari gitu, guys.
subtitles.english: to accompany you on a night stroll, guys.

subtitles.original: Nah, lagu sekeren ini tuh dibuat oleh
subtitles.english: Now, a song this cool was made by

subtitles.original: produser musik yang bernama Shishi-Shishi-san.
subtitles.english: a music producer named Shishi-Shishi-san.

subtitles.original: Bukan sishishishi ya, guys.
subtitles.english: Not "sishishishi," guys.

subtitles.original: Bukan sishishishi ketawa bapak-bapak, guys.
subtitles.english: Not that old man's "sishishishi" laugh, guys.

subtitles.original: Buat yang udah nggak sabar pengen dengerin lagunya lagi, guys,
subtitles.english: For those who can't wait to hear the song again,

subtitles.original: lagunya akan rilis di platform musik digital favorit kalian masing-masing
subtitles.english: the song will be released on your favorite digital music platforms

subtitles.original: di jam 00:00 waktu setempat.
subtitles.english: at 00:00 local time.

subtitles.original: Nanti waktu kalian sudah denger lagunya di jam 00:00,
subtitles.english: Later when you've heard the song at 00:00,

subtitles.original: langsung share yang banyak
subtitles.english: immediately share it a lot

subtitles.original: di grup WA keluarga, sekolah, kantor,
subtitles.english: in your family, school, office WA groups,

subtitles.original: terus apa ya, grup sosmed, forum sosmed,
subtitles.english: then, let's see, social media groups, social media forums,

subtitles.original: pokoknya semuanya lah.
subtitles.english: basically everywhere.

subtitles.original: Biar makin banyak yang dengerin, guys.
subtitles.english: So that more people listen to it, guys.

subtitles.original: Terus buat yang sudah denger,
subtitles.english: Also, for those who have already heard it,

subtitles.original: jangan lupa looping terus lagunya ya, guys.
subtitles.english: don't forget to keep looping the song, guys.

subtitles.original: Et, tunggu dulu.
subtitles.english: Wait a second.

subtitles.original: Perjalanan kita masih belum selesai ya, guys.
subtitles.english: Our journey isn't over yet, guys.

subtitles.original: Masih ada satu tempat lagi yang belum kita kunjungi.
subtitles.english: There's still one more place we haven't visited.

subtitles.original: Risu juga masih mau nyanyi-nyanyi bareng kalian nih, guys.
subtitles.english: Risu still wants to sing together with you all, guys.

subtitles.original: Jadi kita lanjut yuk!
subtitles.english: So, let's keep going!

subtitles.original: ケロッ！とマーチ　いざ進め
subtitles.english: Kero! to March, let's advance

subtitles.original: 地球しんりゃくせよ
subtitles.english: Invade the Earth

subtitles.original: ケケケロッ　傘持って
subtitles.english: Ke-ke-kero, holding umbrellas

subtitles.original: 出かけた日にはいつも晴れ
subtitles.english: Whenever we head out, it's always sunny

subtitles.original: 気をつけ！
subtitles.english: Attention!

subtitles.original: 目をくいしばれ！
subtitles.english: Grit your eyes!

subtitles.original: カレーのライスを炊き忘れ
subtitles.english: Forgot to cook the rice for the curry

subtitles.original: 閉まるドア小指はさんだ
subtitles.english: Pinky finger caught in the closing door

subtitles.original: 飛び乗ったら行き先ちがう
subtitles.english: Jumped on, but it's the wrong destination

subtitles.original: 社員旅行はケロン
subtitles.english: The company trip is to Keron

subtitles.original: あ、買ったほうが安いね晩御飯のおかず
subtitles.english: Ah, it's cheaper to just buy side dishes for dinner

subtitles.original: ピロッ！と突撃　動く歩道
subtitles.english: Piro! to charge, moving walkway

subtitles.original: いてゆけ
subtitles.english: Go forth

subtitles.original: ピッピロッピロ　早寝して
subtitles.english: Pi-piropiro, sleep early

subtitles.original: 目覚まし待たずに二度寝する
subtitles.english: Sleep in twice without waiting for the alarm

subtitles.original: 全体！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 止まれ！回れ！お手！
subtitles.english: Halt! About face! Shake hands!

subtitles.original: 嫌われたいのに愛される
subtitles.english: Wanted to be hated, but ended up being loved

subtitles.original: いらないもの片付けバイバゲン
subtitles.english: Cleaning up unneeded things, buy-bargain

subtitles.original: 欲しいものあるとお金がない
subtitles.english: When there's something I want, I have no money

subtitles.original: 四の五の言えよケロン
subtitles.english: Complain all you want, Keron

subtitles.original: あ、雷鳴っても隠すヘソがない
subtitles.english: Ah, even if it thunders, I have no belly button to hide

subtitles.original: 熱きこの血潮と
subtitles.english: With this hot blood

subtitles.original: 胸に刻まれし闘魂
subtitles.english: The fighting spirit carved in my chest

subtitles.original: 永遠に勝ち誇れ
subtitles.english: Be proud in victory forever

subtitles.original: 我らがケロン
subtitles.english: Our Keron

subtitles.original: 熱きこの血潮と
subtitles.english: With this hot blood

subtitles.original: 胸に刻まれし闘魂
subtitles.english: The fighting spirit carved in my chest

subtitles.original: 永遠に勝ち誇れ
subtitles.english: Be proud in victory forever

subtitles.original: 愛しき星よ
subtitles.english: Oh, beloved planet

subtitles.original: 我らがケロン
subtitles.english: Our Keron

subtitles.original: 全体！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 止まっちゃダメ！
subtitles.english: Don't stop!
